name: Infamous Decade - Argentina '43
description:
Warning! This game is rated 16+ due to some disturbing footages in it!

Finally! We proudly present a game that was scrapped somewhere in 2015, so basically, this one was in development about 6 years. Originally this was meant to be a sequel to our first 3D game called "Old World".

Story:

1943. The bloodiest year in history of mankind. The Second World War rages across Europe. Third Reich's highest command is planning an invasion to South America with the support of Argentinian military junta. Allied forces sent a small group of undercover agents to investigate a German embassy in Buenos-Aires. But something turned wrong - everyone was brutally murdered, except of a teenage girl named Armis Spherr. Now she is the only one who can complete this dangerous mission! 

Key features:

- the first video game about Argentinian 1943 Revolution

- fight Junta soldiers and Reich's mercs in 6 action-packed levels

- experience unique atmosphere of 40's Argentina

This is some sort of a "fan game", so it can't be sold at any price. This game is a result of some spare time and imagination. All copyrighted materials belong to their respective owners. 

Credits:

Alexader Arquestierre - level design

Armis Arquestierre - level design, manual

DenKare - music

Museo de Cine (Argentina) - historical footages
